parsing_result:
# AF ILLUMINATOR

This item is also found in the photo menus (📖 155). Changes to one apply to the other.

# PRODUCT PRIORITY MODE

Selecting **ON** automatically optimizes settings for filming product reviews and the like. This option takes effect only when the mode dial is in the **Vlog** position.

| Options |   |
|---------|---|
| ON      | OFF |

Select **OFF** to adjust settings manually.

# FACE/EYE DETECTION SETTING

Enable or disable Intelligent Face Detection when recording movies.

| Option             | Description                                                                 |
|--------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| FACE DETECTION ON  | See “📷 FACE/EYE DETECTION SETTING” (📖 156).                                |
| OFF                | Intelligent Face Detection and eye priority off.                             |

> ⚠️ If **SINGLE AF** is chosen for **FOCUS MODE** when **FACE DETECTION ON** is selected for **AF/MF SETTING > 🎥 FACE/EYE DETECTION SETTING**, the camera will automatically switch to **CONTINUOUS AF**. Selecting **MANUAL FOCUS** when **FACE DETECTION ON** is selected for **🎥 FACE/EYE DETECTION SETTING** disables Intelligent Face Detection.
